articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Jeremy Diamond
articles.title: Rifts between Biden and Netanyahu spill into public view - CNN
articles.description: Rifts between the United States and Israel spilled into public view Tuesday as President Joe Biden warned that Israel was losing international support for its campaign against Hamas and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu publicly rejected American plans for po…
